item.title: Using gcloud with fzf to interactively SSH to GCP VMs
item.description: The gcloud compute ssh command is a wrapper around SSH that is used to SSH to VMs in GCP. fzf is a command-line fuzzy finder, as the project site states it is an interactive UNIX filter for command-line that can be used with any list, files, etc. The example function below (which can be added to your bash or zsh profile) can be used to interactively select the VM to login to using gcloud compute ssh or SCP a file to a instance.
